item.title: How to Stop Invisible players? DEVOLUTION
item.dc:creator: @Anfernio Anfernio
item.description:
@Anfernio wrote:

if(playuhInvisibleFoSho == true){ return; } else { if(playuhInvisbleFoSho == false){ sendMessage("Yous not invisibles, dawg."); }

That’s my code.

item.source: How to Stop Invisible players? DEVOLUTION

item.title: How to Stop Invisible players? DEVOLUTION
item.dc:creator: @Telenim Telenim
item.description:
@Telenim wrote:

[quote=“lesterknome, post:3, topic:301456”][quote author=Tatemo link=topic=397748.msg2952579#msg2952579 date=1252625189]
Make ur client have to be used. Make a players appearance only allowed to be certain variables and constantly set it to them.
[/quote]

/fail[/quote]Actually he’s right.

If you were able to make the server load a certain client UID (hopefully not a cheat clients) then cheat clients wouldn’t be able to get on to use the invisible command, or you could grab all known cheat client UID’s and force-disconnect them automatically, which would probably only keep the idiots out (don’t worry, 99% of the people that use cheat clients are idiots).

Read full topic
item.source: How to Stop Invisible players? DEVOLUTION
